ability: 【永】 あなたのキャラすべてに、パワーを＋1000し、ソウルを＋1。
（[CHOICE]があるキャラを1枚選び、手札に戻すかストック置場に置いてよい）

name: 少女仕度中 グレーテ
ability: CONT - Your other front row center slot Level 0 or lower character gets +1000 power.
ACT - BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 5 cards of your deck, then send them to Waiting Room. For each CX among them, draw up to 1 card.

name: 少女休息中 エルナ
ability: CONT - If you have 1 or less other characters, this gets +3000 power.

name: ヨック村の錬金術師 サラサ
ability: AUTO - [(2) Send 1 of your other characters on stage to Clock] When this is placed on stage from hand, you may pay cost. If you do, choose 1 Event or CX in your Waiting Room, add it to hand.

name: 走る閃光 夏目
ability: AUTO - When you use this card's BACKUP, if all of your characters are <Fantasia Bunko> or <Sorcery>, you may put the top card of your deck into Stock.
ACT - BACKUP +2000

name: 転生王女と天才令嬢 アニスフィア＆ユフィリア
ability: CONT - If you have 4 or more <Fantasia Bunko> or <Magic> characters, this gets -1 Level in hand.
CONT - If you have 3 or more other characters, this gets +1500 power and "AUTO - ENCORE [Discard 1  <Fantasia Bunko> or <Magic> character]"
AUTO - When this attacks, choose up to 1 card in your opponent's Waiting Room, place it on the top or bottom of their deck.

name: 抑えきれなかった告白 レイニ＆イリア
ability: CONT - If you have 1 or less other characters in your Front Row, this gets +4000 power.
AUTO - At the start of your Attack Phase, if this is Standing, and you have 1 or less other characters in your front row, put up to 3 cards from the top of your deck to Stock.

name: 一緒に追いかける夢 アニスフィア＆ユフィリア
ability: AUTO - When this is placed on stage from hand, you may Heal 1.

AUTO - {CX Combo} During your CX Phase, when the Salvage Soul Trigger Split Soul CX (150) is placed in your CX Area, if you have another <Fantasia Bunko> or <Magic> character, and you have 1 or less other characters in front row, choose 1 of the following 2 effects and resolve it:

a) "Look at up to 6 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 6 cards from among them, send them to Waiting Room, return the rest to the deck, and your opponent shuffles their deck afterwards"
b) "[(1) Discard 2 cards] You may pay cost. If you do, deal 3 damage to your opponent twice."

name: 小悪魔な可愛さ ユフィリア
ability: CONT - All of your other {0/0 Vanilla Anisphia - 137} and {copies of this} gets +1500 power.

AUTO - [Discard 1 <Fantasia Bunko> or <Magic> character] When this is placed on stage from hand, you may pay cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 {0/0 Vanilla Anisphia - 137}, show it to your opponent, add it to hand, and shuffle your deck afterwards.

name: 未来を切り開く2人 アニスフィア＆ユフィリア
ability: CONT - MEMORY - During your turn, if you have a card in Memory, this gets 2500 power, and gains the following ability, "AUTO - When this attacks, if the Level of the character across from this is 2, this turn, this gets +6000 power."

name: 惚れた弱み アニスフィア
悪友の侯爵令嬢 ティルティ
ability: AUTO - When you use this card's BACKUP, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a <Fantasia Bunko> or <Magic> character, add it to hand and discard 1 card.

name: 祝福を贈る虹
ability: 【自】 このカードが手札からCX置場に置かれた時、あなたは自分の控え室のトリガーアイコンに[SOUL]があるキャラを1枚まで選び、手札に戻し、自分のキャラを2枚まで選び、そのターン中、ソウルを＋1。

name: "好きになりたい" アニスフィア＆ユフィリア

AUTO - When this attacks, choose 1 of your <Fantasia Bunko> or <Magic> characters, this turn, it gets +1500 power.

name: 羨望する彼女と共に

name: 【ダイヤモンドダスト】淡雪＆晴

name: 清楚配信 淡雪

name: 聖様の収益化奪還計画 シュワちゃん＆聖
